doc.course_introduction:
What is machine learning, and what kinds of problems can it solve? Google thinks about machine learning slightly differently -- of being about logic, rather than just data. We talk about why such a framing is useful for data scientists when thinking about building a pipeline of machine learning models.
Then, we discuss the five phases of converting a candidate use case to be driven by machine learning, and consider why it is important the phases not be skipped. We end with a recognition of the biases that machine learning can amplify and how to recognize this.
>>> By enrolling in this specialization you agree to the Qwiklabs Terms of Service as set out in the FAQ and located at: https://qwiklabs.com/terms_of_service <<<

doc.course_sub_chapter: [['Intro to ML on GCP Specialization', 'Specialization Agenda', 'Why Google?', 'Why Google Cloud?'], ['What it means to be AI first', 'Two stages of ML', 'ML in Google Products', 'Demo: ML in Google Photos', 'Google Translate and Gmail', 'Replacing Heuristic Rules', "It's all about data", 'Lab Intro - Framing an ML Problem', 'Lab debrief', 'Demo: ML in applications', 'Pre-trained models', 'The ML marketplace is evolving', 'A data strategy', 'Training and serving skew', 'An ML strategy', 'Transform your business', 'Lab Intro - ML use case'], ['Introduction', 'ML Surprise', 'The secret sauce', 'ML and Business Processes', 'The Path to ML', 'End of phases deep dive'], ['Introduction', 'Machine Learning and Human Bias', 'Evaluating Metrics for Inclusion', 'Statistical Measurements and acceptable tradeoffs', 'Equality of Opportunity', 'Simulating Decisions', 'Finding Errors in your dataset using Facets'], ['Module Introduction', 'AI Platform Notebooks', 'Demo: AI Platform Notebooks', 'Development process', 'Computation and storage', 'Intro to Qwiklabs', 'Lab debrief', 'Cloud shell', 'Third Wave of Cloud: Fully-Managed Services', 'Third Wave of Cloud: Serverless Data Analysis', 'Third Wave of Cloud: BigQuery and Cloud Datalab', 'Lab Intro: Analyzing data using AI Platform Notebooks and BigQuery', 'Lab Debrief: Analyzing Data using AI Platform Notebooks and BigQuery', 'ML, not rules', 'Vision API in action', 'Video intelligence API', 'Cloud Speech API', 'Translation and NL', 'Lab: Pretrained ML APIs Intro', 'Lab Solution'], ['Summary: ML Strategy']]
doc.reviews: ['This is too obviously an advertisement for google services disguised as a course.', "The omnipresent Google branding on software used is truly sufficient publicity in an educational setting, the branded t-shirts and multiple statements are superfluous for a Coursera class. Many statements, especially towards the first videos, create an impression that the technology isn't superior enough to sell itself as we learn it, but requires a sales pitch even though we already subscribed to the specialization on that particular Machine Learning software.", 'This course lays the foundation of Machine Learning.', 'As an overview this course is OK. But the quality of labs can be improved. ', 'nice practical overview. I liked the first part with practical examples, the second part is too much marketing for Google APIs for me', 'Though the course provided has some good information for beginners, this is moreover like advertising google products.', 'The notebook based demos are unfortunately pretty useless as labs. All of these courses would be much improved with real labs that require the student to build the system.', 'This course provides Google point of view. Maybe it contains some marketing info, but not too much. So I can recommend this course', 'I got to learn a lot of new things from this course. Especially, I was able to understand what were the most important aspects that a ML engineer will have to focus on. ', 'It was a fantastic introduction on GCP and its capabilities. The Hands on experience was more of fun and amazing stuff to learn. I would like to thank the people who designed and presented this course.', 'Good introduction to Machine Learning basic concepts', 'I enjoyed taking this course, gained an idea of how ML models are being scaled at Google.', 'Great introduction to ML with Google tools and important considerations on how to begin working to take your company into the ML path.', 'Excellent!!', 'Very useful to get a first touch with GCP', 'Nice introduction to GCP.', 'very informative', 'Thumbs Up!', 'its very fun and very usefull to learn', 'very intresting and get a lot experience were gained by this specilaization', 'The Best Course on Giving a Basic Idea of How to Get into Machine Learning Over GCP and Use Pretrained Modules etc Thanks Google and Coursera For this Wonderful Course ', 'good course', 'A great learning experience and importantly those practical classes were very helpful.', 'Excellent Explanation & Example ', 'insightful to see a brand new path to renovate']
doc.reviewers: ['By Kevin C', 'By Yves G', 'By Akshat B', 'By Girish S K', 'By Peter H', 'By shanmukh k', 'By Mike W', 'By Sergey L', 'By Kaustubh M H', 'By Aswin S T', 'By Jenny V', 'By Mercy M', 'By Eduardo G S', 'By Prasenjit P', 'By Vlad N', 'By Atul S M', 'By Marius F', 'By Gregory R G J', 'By A P A P', 'By SULTHAN M N', 'By David P L', 'By charles l', 'By rohit k s', 'By Harshkumar', 'By Adam N']
